Hi there, 

I'm using Heritrix to crawl about 130 domains. It occurs that s=
ome
domains needs specials configurations and I'm doing this with
Refinemen=
t (one for each site that has this need). 

Basically these refinements are=
 made to restrict the crawler by a URI
RegExp. When a URI matches the regul=
ar expression it will not be crawled. 

But I'm having troubles with this a=
pproach, because a great number of
alerts are being generated. The alerts a=
re 2 (they appear many times
during a job):
SEVERE   	  if-match-return(in =
processor LinksScoper)
SEVERE   	  enabled(in processor LinksScoper) 

I'm =
having memory's troubles (java heap space exceeds) and I think
these alerts=
 may be the cause. At this moment there are more than
500.000 alerts. 

So,=
 anyone could help me solve this problem? Or how can I modify the
heritrix.=
properties file to don't launch these alerts?

Thanks in advance! 

Andr=E9=
 Lanna
